org.xbmc.jsonrpc

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbmc.jsonrpc.Connection

  • public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class. Will be instantiated only once and contains mostly help
    Author:
    Team XBMC

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Connection getInstance(java.lang.String host,
                     int port)
        Returns the singleton instance of this connection. Note that host and port settings are only looked at the first time. Use setHost() if you want to update these parameters.
        Parameters:
        host - XBMC host
        port - HTTP API / JSON-RPC port (it's the same)
        Returns:
        Connection instance

      • setHost

        public void setHost(Host host)
        Updates host info of the connection instance
        Parameters:
        host -

      • setHost

        public void setHost(java.lang.String host,
           int port)
        Updates host and port parameters of the connection instance.
        Parameters:
        host - Host or IP address of the host
        port - HTTP port

      • setAuth

        public void setAuth(java.lang.String user,
           java.lang.String pass)
        Sets authentication info
        Parameters:
        user - Username
        pass - Password

      • setTimeout

        public void setTimeout(int timeout)
        Sets socket read timeout (connection timeout has constant value)
        Parameters:
        timeout - Read timeout in milliseconds.

      • getThumbInputStream

        public java.io.InputStream getThumbInputStream(java.lang.String url,
                                      INotifiableManager manager)
                                        throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • query

        public JsonNode query(java.lang.String command,
             JsonNode parameters,
             INotifiableManager manager)
        Executes a query.
        Parameters:
        command - Name of the command to execute
        parameters - Parameters
        manager - Reference back to business layer
        Returns:
        Parsed JSON object, empty object on error.

      • getJson

        public JsonNode getJson(INotifiableManager manager,
               java.lang.String method,
               JsonNode parameters)
        Executes a JSON-RPC command and returns the result as JSON object.
        Parameters:
        manager - Upper layer reference for error posting
        method - Name of the method to run
        parameters - Parameters of the method
        Returns:
        Result

                         java.lang.String method,
                         ObjectNode parameters,
                         java.lang.String returnField)
        Executes an JSON-RPC method and returns the result from a field as string.
        Parameters:
        manager - Upper layer reference for error posting
        method - Name of the method to run
        parameters - Parameters of the method, separated by ";"
        returnField - Name of the field to return
        Returns:
        Result
